pages.text: Lots of O-Animals herd together naturally. They'll follow a 'leader' around in order to stay safe. This also means you can easily corral a group of cows, for example, without having to use a billion leads.
O-Horses can herd other animals while being ridden. These animals include Cows, Sheep, and Wild O-Horses. These animals will naturally run from your horse, so you can corral them into your pens.
